name: Xenophobia (Bellwether Games)
description:
XENOPHOBIA

The Xeno Force has invaded! An alien race made of organic technology threatens all of humanity and you must defend the solar system against waves of onslaught. Blast and shoot through 3 levels of arcade action!

GAMEPLAY

Shoot enemies to score points and collect pickups while dodging their shots.  Collect blue orbs to fill up your Charge Blast and fire off a powerful shot. Grab the pod ships to beef up your arsenal. Collecting points will award you with end-level bonuses. Red orbs refill your health bar. Watch out for the boss!!

CONTROLS

Directional Keys - Move

X - Shoot

Z - Fire Charge Blast

Thanks for playing!! Click the cart image and download the cart to run load the game in your PICO-8 console!
